title: LG Stainless Steel Side-By-Side Refrigerator LSXS26326S - Overview
description:
LG Stainless Steel Side-By-Side Refrigerator - LSXS26326S http://www.abt.com/product/83175/LG-LSXS26326S.html

It shouldn’t take you five minutes to find the mustard. With adjustable slide-out shelving gallon-size door baskets and multiple drawers — our side-by-side refrigerators give you incredible organization so you can find just what you need in a snap. Plus they come with sophisticated LG styling and features like Space Plus Ice System IcePlus™ an intuitive LED display contoured doors and Digital Temperature Controls to help keep your food fresher than ever.

Features:
Style and Design
• 26.2 Cu. Ft.
• Monochromatic Flush-Mount Ice & Water Dispenser
• Contoured Doors with Matching Handles
• Hidden Hinges
• Interior LED Lighting

Organization
• 4 SpillProtector™ Tempered Glass Shelves
• 4 Refrigerator Door Bins
• 2 Crisper Bins
• 3 Fixed Freezer Door Bins
• Plastic Freezer Drawer
Performance
• Digital Temperature Controls
• LED Display
• Door Alarm
• LoDecibel™ Quiet Operation
Specifications:
Capacity
• Refrigerator: 17.0 cu. ft.
• Freezer: 9.2 cu. ft.
• Total: 26.2 cu. ft.
General
• Ice & Water Dispenser
• Dispenser Type: Integrated Tall Ice & Water
• Ice System: SpacePlus
• Daily Ice Production: 3.0 lbs / 3.2 (IcePlus)
• Ice Storage Capacity: 3.5 lbs
• Water Filtration System: LT800P
• Multi Air Flow Cooling
• Temperature Sensors: 5
• Display Type: Membrane / Green LED
• Temperature Controls: Electronic/Digital
• Door Alarm
• Child Lock
• LoDecibel™ Quiet Operation
• Auto Closing Door Hinge
Refrigerator
• No. of Shelves: 4
• Crisper Bins: 2 Humidity Crispers
• Refrigerator Light: Ceiling LED
Refrigerator Door
• No. of Shelves/Bin: 4
• Door Bin Construction: 1 Piece (Clear)
• Dairy Corner
Freezer
• No. of Shelves: 3
• Shelf Construction: Glass
• Door Bins: 3 Fixed
• No. of Drawers: 2
• Freezer Light: Premium LED
Materials and Finishes
• Contour Door
• Hidden Hinges
• Toe Grille
• Surface: Stainless Steel/Coated Metal
• Back: Flush & Metal cover over mechanical parts
• Handles: Matching Commercial Handles
